original: 時為奮武將軍，與聯軍諸將一同駐兵酸棗，雖有對抗董卓涼州軍團之志，然聯軍諸將卻各懷異心，觀望不前。
text: At that time, General Fenwu, and the generals of the coalition army stationed in Jujube, although they have the ambition to fight against the Dong Zhuoliangzhou army, but the generals of the coalition army are different and wait and see.
